directions: Combine the cranberries, water, white sugar, and brown sugar in a saucepan.  Bring to a boil over high heat; cook uncovered for 5 minutes.  Spoon off any foam that forms.  Serve hot or cold.
ingredients: 1 (12 ounce) package fresh cranberries, picked through and rinsed
title: Michelle's Famous Washed Cranberry Sauce
